- 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Ross, You are very welcome! I enjoyed speaking with you and am happy to answer any questions that may come up as you review the information I have sent you. Have a great evening,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Ross Mitchell [mailto:Ross@CableMountain.net] Sent: Thursday, January 26, 2012 12:21 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Nicolette,I appreciate you taking the time to answer my questions this morning. Thanks for this enrollment info and the email with the Cash Flow Estimates. Take Care, Ross From: ntaylor@mbopartners.com [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] Sent: Thursday, January 26, 2012 10:09 AM To: ross@cablemountain.net Subject: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Dear Ross, Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become an MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. - Please begin enrollment by clicking here <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=PersonalInfo&ec=MBOMBE&reset=true&cd=10A49A39882B22E7392600>. - Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions. - At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns.
We look forward to working with you. Regards, Nicolette TaylorEnrollment Manager Direct: 703-793-6281 Toll Free: 800-556-0270MBO Partners13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300Herndon, VA 20171http://www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com%20> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
